about_the_game:
Have you always wanted to be a king, but all the kingdoms are already taken? Try to be the Poop King in the Poop Clicker game! A magical unicorn, sweet corn and others will help you with this! Unlock special upgrades, but take your time, because haste makes waste!

Poop clicker - the game where you need to click. As much you click more you get coins. The coins could be swapped for special upgrades and additional objects which would help you getting more and more coins.



Swap your poops for special chanses!
Unlock new upgrades!
Get the hardest achievements within the game!

Show your friends who is a real poop king here!

Sweet Life of Cute Poops v 1.3

We're thrilled to announce the latest update to our game that's sure to make you smile!

Introducing the "Sweet Life of Cute Poops" update!

New items to boost the game's dynamics! Now your adorable poop will move even faster! Speed is the key to success!

We heard you loud and clear! The bug that was causing your computer to go on a memory munching spree has been successfully squashed! Nothing can stop your progress in the game now! We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

We're always listening and striving to make our game even better!

Big update v. 1.2

By the request of the users, more than 30 gaming and steam achievements have been added



Added the new gaming experience
Added 3 times more items in the store
Added the ability to upgrade each of the store's items
Added special items
Added music and sounds
Added settings with the ability to disable sounds and effects
Improved the game saving

The game has been completely redesigned, thanks for your feedback and comments.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Poop Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 + GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: 2.0 + GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio
